title: Taffer Sees 'Darn Good' Summer for Restaurants
itunes:title: Taffer Sees 'Darn Good' Summer for Restaurants
description:
Jon Taffer, Host and Executive Producer of Bar Rescue, discusses the recovery of the bar and restaurant industry.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
